cluster_relations.rel_desc: The equality principle 'all men are created equal' forms part of the principles underpinning future protests and revolutions.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject principle is an ideological or conceptual component of a broader set or framework of principles represented by the object.
cluster_relations.object_entity_name: principles underpinning future protests and revolutions
remarks: Principles are treated as a set; this relation links one member of that set to the whole.
Principles are treated as a set; this relation links one member of that set to the whole.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The concept of unalienable rights is part of the principles underpinning future protests and revolutions.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject principle is an ideological or conceptual component of a broader set or framework of principles represented by the object.
cluster_relations.object_entity_name: principles underpinning future protests and revolutions
remarks: As above, linking a specific right principle to the broader set.
As above, linking a specific right principle to the broader set.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The First French Republic is described as being based on the principles of liberty, equality, and fraternity.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that an institutional or political entity is founded upon or derives its core principles or legitimacy from a specified set of ideas or values.
